title: Looking for Help
body:
I am working with vb.net to make my own personal statistics display. How would I go about getting my statistics from League? 

I know about LolKing and websites like that. I want to query the information that they are using in my own way. I just do not know how to look up getting that information.

Sorry if I am putting this on the wrong board.

replies.body:
I have no idea how to use this (I've not looked into it) but I believe you want the Riot Games API?

[https://developer.riotgames.com/](https://developer.riotgames.com/)

Good luck!
Thanks for the link. Is there a forum for questions about the API that you know of?

> [{quoted}](name=Squeekems,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=IsIQ19xo,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-24T23:09:11.945+0000)
>
> Thanks for the link. Is there a forum for questions about the API that you know of?

I believe that [https://developer.riotgames.com/discussion/index](https://developer.riotgames.com/discussion/index) will get you what you want.  It *should* be linked off the page linked, but it might be tricky to find.
Hahaha. I found. I went to check before asking the question, but the site wasn't loading for me so I thought I'd ask you anyways. Thanks again! :D
